meanings.definition: The action of apportioning something unfairly or in a biased manner.
meanings.sent1: The malapportionments in the distribution of candies at the party caused a lot of arguments.
meanings.sent2: The malapportionments of resources among the students led to dissatisfaction among the group.
meanings.sent3: The malapportionments of chores in the household made the dog the official vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent4: The malapportionments of responsibilities in the team turned the quiet member into the leader.
meanings.sent5: The malapportionments of colors in the painting made it look like a chaotic masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The result of distributing something unevenly or inequitably.
meanings.sent1: The malapportionments in the cake slices left some guests with tiny pieces.
meanings.sent2: The malapportionments of time between subjects made it hard for students to focus.
meanings.sent3: The malapportionments of toppings on the pizza made it resemble a food art piece.
meanings.sent4: The malapportionments of sunlight in the room created interesting shadow patterns.
meanings.sent5: The malapportionments of flavors in the dish made it a surprising culinary experience.
